attributes.action: Never to vote again if the will of the people is not upheld by leaving the EU.
attributes.additional_details: The Labour Party are a disgrace trying to force a General Election. Members of the Conservative Party going against the government should be expelled from the Party.
attributes.background: In June 2016 the UK votedto leave the EU. MPs voted overwhelmingly to initiate Article 50 but have since ignored the Democratic will of the people. This is totally undemocratic and therefore what is the use of voting for anything in the future.

rejection.details:
Whether or not to vote is a decision for individuals, not the UK Parliament or Government. 

Whether a member of a political party should be expelled is a decision for that political party, not the UK Parliament or Government.

You might like to sign and share one or more of these petitions. 
 
Brexit article 50 must not be withdrawn https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/246387
  
Leave the EU Without a deal on April 12th https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/248281 
 
Leave EU by April 12th 2019 with deal or no deal https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/250967 

Leave with No Deal if Parliament rejects the EU Withdrawal Agreement https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234393
 
Renegotiate the Brexit deal immediately in the event MPs vote against it https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234195
 
Support the Prime Minister's Brexit Deal https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/233104

Say no to another EU Referendum aka "Peoples Vote" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/241418
